name: 3D Village Party
description: This 20 x 24 painting is 3D because of the kind of technique the artist uses. Instead of a brush, a knife makes the paint stand out rather than lie flat on the canvas. You can feel and see the colors and it makes the painting much more interesting. It is called a village party because a few people are assembled outside a home, some with food, and they are ready to enter the hut and enjoy themselves. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: The Village Crowd
description: Can you imagine stepping outside your home and barely having any place to move? Well this 20 x 24 painting is an example of this scenario. The village is having a market blowout and most of the village is out doing different duties, from carrying items on their head to a location to exchanging things with each other. So many women are out and it can be considered a festivity in the village with a beautiful green and blue background. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Mellow Market
description: This 24 x 20 painting depicts a mellow market. The men and women are working but they are socializing and talking with each other too. The artist uses soft colors and a calm brown background to set the kind of mood he wanted for his viewers. The people are sitting and smiling which might influence anyone who looks at this ethnic painting and lighten their spirits. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Faceless Colors
description: This 20 x 24 painting is a contradiction in itself. It has faceless dark people in it but they are in a colorful market. The bright yellows and greens are the direct opposite of the black faces of the people which is what makes this painting intriguing. The viewer will be captivated and motivated to come up with an explanation to this piece of art. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Colorful Market
description: This 20 x 24 colorful painting pops in a simple way. It shows people in a market with baskets and fruits and vegetables doing different tasks. The basic colors the artist uses makes this painting more radiant. It brightens the room and brings a different ethnic feel to it. The Caribbean market is a culture that some are not accustomed to so allowing this painting into your home and/or gallery will expose people to a new thing. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: 3D Village With A River
description: This 20 x 24 painting was created with a knife, meaning it is 3D. The trees, bushes, and even the people stand out and can even be felt on the canvas versus a flat surface. Everything on this painting is elevated and it depicts a village with a river streaming through the middle just in a unique style that will capture anyone's attention. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: The Colorful Crowd
description: This 23 x 20 painting depicts a crowd of colorful people. This assembly of men are together for a reason for the viewer to decide. There are stripes, circles, and curves, and many different different elements to this painting to keep anyone interested. It would brighten up any room and be a great piece to add to any collection. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Purple Passion
description: The 24½ x 20 purple valley is astonishing. It is an abstract to some extent and the visual is mind boggling. You are not sure whether there are trees or bushes or cactus's or what kind of birds are in the water. Every time you pass by the painting it will give you something to think about, which is why it would be an interesting piece to add to your collection. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: The Village On The Hill
description: There is a village built on a hill in this 24 x 20 painting. It is amazing how the artist can show these dimensions by using a flat surface. Below the sky, you can see mountains, which is where the top of the hill and the waterfall begin. There are also trees, bushes, people, and many other things that you would expect to see in a village just in a special way. The artist creates a 3D effect just by looking at the piece alone. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Blue Wonderland
description: This 16 x 20 painting looks like a page out of a Dr. Seuss book. This magically animated piece has everything from women to trees to plants and flowers and a beautiful river. Even the sky is different colors, which fits in well with all of the other amazing colors that this artist uses to make this artwork interesting and enchanted. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Light Blue Picking Field
description: This is a great 16 x 19½ painting that depicts women in a field picking leaves and flowers. The blue tone is calming and contrasts with the colorful dresses of the ladies, but they both blend in well with each other. There are birds that create an S-like shape around the uncommon yet beautiful trees. A piece like this is very intriguing and can be a part of any room. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: The Dark Swamp
description: This 15½ x 19 piece shows a dark but well painted swamp. The detail of the trees and the water makes the viewer fall into the visual and believe that they are a part of this painting. The dark colors of the night make you feel somewhat gloomy but will fit well into any room with dark green or blue colors. The occasional orange is the unique part of this art piece so anyone can identify with it. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: 3D Trees By The River
description: This 15½ x 12 painting depicts 2 women by the river washing their clothes and another woman walking back to a hut. What may seem like an ordinary painting is actually unique because of the knife strokes the artist uses. It may not be seen in the pictures but the trees in the background and some parts of the women are 3D because it stands out and can be felt on the canvas, while the rest of the painting is flat. It is a rare component that allows this painting to stand out no matter where it is placed. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Village Women In The Market Field
description: This 12 x 16 original piece shows several women in the marketplace completing several tasks such as doing the laundry and selling fruits. A painting like this might be familiar because in the Caribbean you can find many places that are similar to what is shown. Women of color can come together in a commonplace to handle many duties while overlooking the land. An art piece like this is wonderful to have in ones collection. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Blue Beige Brother
description: This 12 x 16 painting depicts an African American man among fruits, vegetables, and a piece of wood. It is drawn in different shades of brown by an experienced artist. The mans lack of emotion coincides with the aura of the painting which is why he can be called blue. It is a beautiful abstract item that can attract anyone who passes by in a home and/or a gallery. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.

name: Colorful Rain Forest With Waterfall & Birds
description: This 11x16 painting will bring color and light to whatever room it is placed in. From the trees to the plants to the birds and the waterfall, this design adds a unique twist to something so typical. Signed by its original artist, this art piece is a good deal for anyone who chooses to add it to their collection. Note: If requested, the painting can be dismounted and sent in a tube by the seller and shipped for free to the buyer, if you are located in the United States. The buyer must request this service before purchasing the painting and the price will be changed.
